headline: Nike and Under Armour’s Potential Ransomware Attacks: What to Know
summary: The alleged ransomware breach at Nike is reportedly attached to a countdown clock expiring 6 p.m. Saturday when stolen data could be leaked publicly.

raw.headline: Nike and Under Armour’s Potential Ransomware Attacks: What to Know
raw.summary: The alleged ransomware breach at Nike is reportedly attached to a countdown clock expiring 6 p.m. Saturday when stolen data could be leaked publicly.

headline: Shuffle Board: CEO Changes for Nike China, Mud, Bottega and Bleckmann
summary: EMEA exec Carl Grebert and Greater China CEO Angela Dong are out at Nike; ex-Drexel dean Jason Schupbach succeeds Dr. Joyce Brown as president of FIT.

raw.headline: Shuffle Board: CEO Changes for Nike China, Mud, Bottega and Bleckmann
raw.summary: EMEA exec Carl Grebert and Greater China CEO Angela Dong are out at Nike; ex-Drexel dean Jason Schupbach succeeds Dr. Joyce Brown as president of FIT.

headline: Target adds former Nike innovation chief to board
summary: The mass retailer — which is undergoing a turnaround effort — also appointed the former CEO of HanesBrands to the board of directors.

raw.headline: Target adds former Nike innovation chief to board
raw.summary: The mass retailer — which is undergoing a turnaround effort — also appointed the former CEO of HanesBrands to the board of directors.

headline: How Nike’s “Win Now” Overhaul At NIKE (NKE) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Nike has recently accelerated its “Win Now” overhaul under CEO Elliott Hill, reshaping leadership in EMEA, Greater China and APLA while rebalancing its wholesale and direct-to-consumer mix and refocusing on sport performance and product innovation. This combination of leadership turnover and a reset of Nike’s sales model marks a turning point that could reshape how the brand competes against faster-growing rivals globally. Next, we’ll examine how this renewed emphasis on wholesale...
